changeEmail.confirmPassword: To update your email you must confirm your password.

changePasswordForm.passwordRequirements: Must include 12 characters, at least 1 number (e.g. 0 - 9), and at least 1 symbol (e.g. &*#)

userSettings.smtpRequired: Editing your email address requires that SMTP or SES is configured in order to send a validation email. Users with Admin role can configure SMTP in **Settings > Organization settings**.

validation.confirmPasswordRequired: New password confirmation must be present
validation.passwordMismatch: New password confirmation does not match new password
validation.nameRequired: Full name field must be completed

ticketDestinations.title: Ticket destinations
ticketDestinations.description: Add or edit integrations to create tickets when Fleet detects new vulnerabilities.
ticketDestinations.validationFailed: There was a problem with the information you provided.
ticketDestinations.badRequest: Invalid login credentials or URL. Please correct and try again.
ticketDestinations.unknownError: We experienced an error when attempting to connect. Please try again later.

ticketDestinations.deleteError: Could not delete {{integration}}. Please try again.

emptyTable.header: No users match the current criteria

users.addErrorPasswordTooLong: Password is over the character limit.

roleTooltips.gitops: The GitOps role is only available on the command-line when creating an API-only user. This user has no access to the UI.
roleTooltips.observerPlus: Users with the Observer+ role have access to all of the same functions as an Observer, with the added ability to run any live query against all hosts.

deleteUser.title: Delete user
deleteUser.message: You are about to delete {{name}} from Fleet.

resetPassword.title: Require password reset
resetPassword.message: This user will be asked to reset their password after their next successful log in to Fleet.
resetPassword.revokeTokens: This will revoke all active Fleet API tokens for this user.

resetSessions.title: Reset sessions
resetSessions.message: This user will be logged out of Fleet.
resetSessions.revokeTokens: This will revoke all active Fleet API tokens for this user.

forms.inviteUserTooltip:
The "Invite user" feature requires that SMTP or SES is configured in order to send invitation emails.

SMTP can be configured in Settings > Organization settings.
forms.editEmailTooltip:
Editing an email address requires that SMTP or SES is configured in order to send a validation email.

Users with Admin role can configure SMTP in Settings > Organization settings.
forms.ssoNotEnabled:
SSO is not enabled in organization settings.
User must sign in with a password.
forms.passwordHelp: 12-48 characters, with at least 1 number (e.g. 0 - 9) and 1 symbol (e.g. &*#).
forms.temporaryPasswordTooltip:
This password is temporary. This user will be asked to set a new password after logging in to the Fleet UI.

This user will not be asked to set a new password after logging in to fleetctl or the Fleet API.
forms.twoFactorAuthHelp: User will be asked to authenticate with a magic link that will be sent to their email.
forms.twoFactorAuthTooltip:
This feature requires that SMTP or SES is configured in order to send authentication emails.

SMTP can be configured in Settings > Organization settings.
forms.noTeamsInfo: Expecting to see teams? Try again in a few seconds as the system catches up or
forms.globalUserInfo: Global users can manage or observe all users, entities, and settings in Fleet.
forms.teamUserInfo: Users can manage or observe team-specific users, entities, and settings in Fleet.
forms.selectTeam: Please select at least one team for this user.

delete.warning: If this custom variable is used in any configuration profiles or scripts, they will fail. To resolve, edit the configuration profile or script.
